artist: Etcher: Francesco Bartolozzi; Artist: After Hans Holbein the Younger; Publisher: John Chamberlaine
description: bust length portrait of young man facing forward; short hair, soft hat with feather, jacket and shirt with high collar
inscription:
Signature, Date and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: From the Original Drawing by Hans Holbein   Engraved by F. Bartolozzi R.A. Historical Engraver to His Majetsy/  IN HIS MAJESTY\'S COLLECTION / Published as the Act Directs April 1, 1795 by I. Chamberlaine
title: Print
